definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: According to the conodont and fusulinid fossils, their ages are determined to be Devonian -Permian.
sentences.chinese: 根据所含化石确定地层形成时代为泥盆纪至二叠纪。

sentences.english: The Permian was curtailed by massive volcanism.
sentences.chinese: 二叠纪被大量火山爆发缩短了时间。

sentences.english: The metallization is controlled by the Permian volcanic lithofacies and volcanic edifice.
sentences.chinese: 其成矿作用主要受二叠纪火山岩相及火山机构控制。

definition: Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
Pleistocene (geological epoch from 2m years ago, covering the most recent ice ages)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Phanerozoic, geological eon lasting since the Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪[Han2 wu3 ji4], c. 540m year ago
